title: Bjørn Mo Forum
text: Bjørn Mo Forum is a Doctoral Research Fellow at the Department of Political Science at the University of Oslo. His research focuses on cabinet decision-making and appointments in parliamentary democracies.

title: Research
text: Askim, Jostein; Forum, Bjørn Mo & Tranøy, Bent Sofus (2024). The party politics of policy endurance: parliamentary settlements in Norway, 1980-2021. I Lucas, Patrick; Nabatchi, Tina; O’Flynn, Janine & ’t Hart, Paul (Red.), Pathways to Positive Public Administration. Edward Elgar Publishing. ISSN 9781803929163. doi: 10.4337/9781803929170.00034

title: Research
text:
Working Papers

Forum, B. M. & Hesstvedt, S. Partisan Appointees to Government Commissions in Norway 1972-2018. [Working Paper]
Forum, B. M., Askim, J., & Mangset, M. Restraining Politics: The development of a meritocratic appointment system, Norway 1660-2023. [Working Paper]
Rasch, B.E., Forum B. M. & Bucur C. Portfolio Allocation in Parliamentary Governments. Working Paper
Forum, B. M. Bureaucratic Turnover Under New Governments: The moderating effects of organizational buffering. [Working Paper]
